title: Number of students in upper secondary education in Denmark 2008 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of students has decreased over the Year.
Number of students is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Number of students, of value 148051.0 was reached at Year 2013
The lowest Number of students, of value 147760.0 was reported at Year 2014
min_summary: In general Number of students has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of students is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014.
